 Galvatron felt the imcomeign transmission. he was unsure wiether he  should 
except this unique way of speaking. He tried to set up blocks inside his 
brain. trying to protect himself form anything that halucenagin may try. but 
he  let him in to talk. "Yes halucenigen...what is it that we must speak in 
this way."

--part1_129.3f8dabc.28c19eb9_boundary
